text: It: Chapter Two is a 2019 American supernatural horror movie directed by Andy Muschietti and written by Gary Dauberman. It is a sequel to the 2017 movie It, taking place 27 years after the first movie. It is based on the novel of the same name by Stephen King. The movie stars James McAvoy, Jessica Chastain, Jay Ryan, Bill Hader, Isaiah Mustafa, James Ransone and Andy Bean. Bill Skarsg√•rd reprises his role as Pennywise the Dancing Clown. It is produced by New Line Cinema, Vertigo Entertainment and Rideback, and distributed by Warner Bros. Pictures. The movie was released on September 6, 2019. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * * * Category:2019 drama movies Category:2019 horror movies Category:2019 thriller movies Category:2010s drama thriller movies Category:2010s horror thriller movies Category:2010s supernatural movies Category:American drama thriller movies Category:American horror thriller movies Category:American supernatural movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies set in Maine Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies about clowns Category:Movies set in the 2010s Category:Movies about friendship Category:Movies about domestic violence Category:Movies about writers Category:Movies about child death Category:Movies composed by Benjamin Wallfisch
title: It Chapter Two
